00032 #ifndef __KX_CLIENTOBJECTINFO_H__
00033 #define __KX_CLIENTOBJECTINFO_H__
00034 
00035 /* Note, the way this works with/without sumo is a bit odd */
00036 
00037 #include <list>
00038 
00039 class SCA_ISensor;
00040 class KX_GameObject;
00044 struct KX_ClientObjectInfo
00045 {
00046     enum clienttype {
00047         STATIC,
00048         ACTOR,
00049         RESERVED1,
00050         SENSOR,
00051         OBSENSOR,
00052         OBACTORSENSOR
00053     }       m_type;
00054     KX_GameObject*  m_gameobject;
00055     void*       m_auxilary_info;
00056     std::list<SCA_ISensor*> m_sensors;
00057 public:
00058     KX_ClientObjectInfo(KX_GameObject *gameobject, clienttype type = STATIC, void *auxilary_info = NULL) :
00059         m_type(type),
00060         m_gameobject(gameobject),
00061         m_auxilary_info(auxilary_info)
00062     {}
00063     
00064     KX_ClientObjectInfo(const KX_ClientObjectInfo &copy) :
00065           m_type(copy.m_type),
00066           m_gameobject(copy.m_gameobject),
00067           m_auxilary_info(copy.m_auxilary_info)
00068     {
00069     }
00070     
00071     virtual ~KX_ClientObjectInfo() {}
00072     
00073     virtual bool hasCollisionCallback() 
00074     {
00075         return m_sensors.size() != 0;
00076     }
00077     
00078     bool isActor() { return m_type <= ACTOR; }
00079     bool isSensor() { return m_type >= SENSOR && m_type <= OBACTORSENSOR; }
00080     
00081     
00082 #ifdef WITH_CXX_GUARDEDALLOC
00083 public:
00084     void *operator new(size_t num_bytes) { return MEM_mallocN(num_bytes, "GE:KX_ClientObjectInfo"); }
00085     void operator delete( void *mem ) { MEM_freeN(mem); }
00086 #endif
00087 };
00088 
00089 #endif //__KX_CLIENTOBJECTINFO_H__
